itemselectr 0.1
  • Reference

This R package contains functions that may be useful in test construction and development. To install the itemselectr package users will need to have the devtools package installed on their machines.

{r} install.packages("devtools") Next, the devtools package must be loaded after which the itemselectr package can be downloaded and installed.

{r} library(devtools) install_github("deondb1967/itemselectr")
